CHANNEL_GPIO_CLK_ENABLE.help: HAL function for DAC CHANNEL kind of hardcoded to stm value, should not have to change - Macro name MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_CHANNEL_GPIO_CLK_ENABLE

DAC_CLK_ENABLE.help: HAL function for DAC_CLOCK_ENABLE, should not have to change - Macro name MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_CLK_ENABLE

DAC_FORCE_RESET.help: HAL function for DAC_FORCE_RESET, should not have to change - Macro name MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_FORCE_RESET

DAC_RELEASE_RESET.help: HAL function for DAC_FORCE_RESET, should not have to change - Macro name MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_RELEASE_RESET

DMA_CHANNEL_I.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for I channel - I channel means Channel 2, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DMA_CHANNEL_I

DMA_CHANNEL_Q.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DMA_CHANNEL_Q can be same as I channel

DMA_STREAM_I.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for I channel - I channel means Channel 2, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DMA_STREAM_I

DMA_STREAM_Q.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DMA_STREAM_Q can be same as I channel

DAC_CHANNEL_I.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for I channel - I channel means channel 2, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_CHANNEL_I

DAC_CHANNEL_Q.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_CHANNEL_Q can be same as I cahnnel

DAC_I_IRQN.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for I channel - I channel means channel 2, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_I_IRQN

DAC_Q_IRQN.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_Q_IRQN can be same as I cahnnel

DAC_I_IRQ_HANDLER.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for I channel - I channel means channel 2, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_I_IRQ_HANDLER

DAC_Q_IRQ_HANDLER.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_DAC_Q_IRQ_HANDLER can be same as I cahnnel

PIN_I.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_PIN_I can be same as I cahnnel

PIN_Q.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_PIN_Q can be same as I cahnnel

PIN_PORT_I.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_PIN_PORT_I can be same as I cahnnel

PIN_PORT_Q.help: HAL function DMA CHANNEL for Q channel - Q channel means channel 1, check dma documentation MBED_CONF_MBEDDUALDAC_PIN_PORT_Q can be same as I cahnnel
